abstract: Americans competing in track and field championships in Beijing experience both ends of the spectrum at finish lines; Ashton Eaton wins decathlon gold, beating his own world record set in United States Olympic trials in 2012, but Jamaican team takes 4x100 relay after botched handoff between Americans Mike Rodgers and Tyson Gay.
lead_paragraph: The American decathlete Ashton Eaton bettered his world record, but Jamaica won the 4x100-meter relay at the world championships as the United States team botched a handoff.

headline.main: Ashton Eaton’s Record Moment for U.S. Is Tempered by Error in 4x100 Relay
headline.print_headline: After American Hits New High, Countrymen Experience a Familiar Low

snippet: The American decathlete Ashton Eaton bettered his world record, but Jamaica won the 4x100-meter relay at the world championships as the United States team botched a handoff.
